value.name: Driver accused of hitting two people peacefully protesting police shooting of Andrew Brown Jr.
value.description: Lisa Michelle O'Quinn, who is white, was charged with striking two Black women with her car. North Carolina authorities are still investigating if it was a hate crime.

video.name: Shooting of Andrew Brown Jr. found ‘justified’ by district attorney

value.name: Andrew Mendez Allegedly Pulled Fake Gun, Sexually Assaulted Ride Share Driver, Prosecutors Say
value.description: A Fort Lee man is accused of pulling a fake gun and sexually assaulting a ride share driver. Prosecutors say Andrew Mendez, 30, attacked the driver back in February of 2020. The Passaic County Prosecutor’s Office says Mendez pulled out a fake gun and demanded his driver perform sexual acts and threatened to hurt her if she didn’t.

value.name: North Carolina driver arrested after striking protesters with car: Police
value.description: A North Carolina motorist is behind bars after authorities said she struck two protesters during a Monday demonstration for Andrew Brown, a black man who was shot and killed by police in mid-April during the execution of a drug warrant.

value.name: Body Camera Footage Shows Andrew Brown Driving Away From Officers Before 'Justified' Shooting
value.description: Body camera footage released from the fatal shooting of Andrew Brown Jr. in Elizabeth City, North Carolina, last month showed deputies running toward Brown, a 42-year-old Black man, who was driving away in his car when officers began shooting.

video.name: Video Shows Police Pin Down, Arrest Protester Out Past Curfew In Elizabeth City

value.name: Driver hit 2 Andrew Brown Jr. demonstrators in Elizabeth City, police say
value.description: A North Carolina woman is behind bars after police said she drove into two pedestrians who were protesting the killing of Andrew Brown Jr. Elizabeth City Police Department arrested Lisa Michelle O'Quinn,

video.name: Driver hit 2 Andrew Brown Jr. demonstrators in Elizabeth City, police say

value.name: Local police departments enforce speeding, loud exhaust laws in joint effort
value.description: The Huntington Beach, Laguna Beach and Newport Beach police departments were among the law enforcement agencies that carried out a joint operation to mitigate speeding and loud exhaust violations.

value.name: N.C. driver hit 2 women with car as they protested death of Andrew Brown Jr., police say
value.description: A white woman was arrested in North Carolina Monday after she drove her car into two Black women “peacefully protesting” the police shooting of Andrew Brown Jr., authorities said, saying the incident may have been a hate crime.

video.name: N.C. woman hit 2 women with car as they ‘peacefully’ protested death of Andrew Brown Jr., police say

value.name: Police: 2 protesters hit, driver charged
value.description: The two women, who are black, were peacefully protesting at about 6:45 p.m. when they were hit, police said. They were treated at a hospital and released. O’Quinn, who is white, is charged with two counts of assault with a deadly weapon with intent to kill by the use of a motor vehicle,

value.name: Driver arrested, accused of hitting 2 protesters in Elizabeth City
value.description: The demonstrators were marching in response to the death of Andrew Brown Jr. Police were looking at whether the driver committed a hate crime.

value.name: Police see a threat. Family sees fear. Expert sees clips of Andrew Brown Jr. show 'everything wrong with policing'.
value.description: Video shows Andrew Brown Jr. driving away from deputies, but DA Andrew Womble said he endangered them. The deputies will not be charged in his death.

video.name: Cops in Andrew Brown Jr. shooting won't face charges, prosecutors say shooting 'justified'

value.name: 'Everything wrong with policing in America': Clips of Andrew Brown Jr. shooting show the limits of bodycam videos
value.description: Video shows Andrew Brown Jr. driving away from deputies, but the DA says he endangered their lives. The deputies will not face charges in his death.

video.name: 'Everything wrong with policing in America': Clips of Andrew Brown Jr. shooting show the limits of bodycam videos

value.name: Elizabeth City Police: 2 protesters struck by vehicle, driver charged
value.description: Two women were hit by a car while protesting a police killing in Elizabeth City on Monday, police said. Michelle Morris, 42, and Valerie Lindsey, 42, were hit by a car driven by 41-year-old Lisa O’Quinn of Greenville,
